sentences.sContent: I am a historian, and I teach in an American university.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am a historian, and I teach in an American university.
sentences.sCn: 我是一位历史学家，在美国一所大学任教。

sentences.sContent: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.sCn: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.sContent: The historian drew a horizontal line on the date to remember it.
sentences.sContent_eng: The historian drew a horizontal line on the date to remember it.
sentences.sCn: 历史学家在日期上画了一条水平线来记住这天。

words.tran: 历史的；史学的；基于史实的
有历史意义的；历史上著名的
历史上地；从历史观点上说
历史，历史学；历史记录；来历

trans.tranOther: A historian is a person who specializes in the study of history, and who writes books and articles about it
